title: Save up to 20% on the Incase ARC Commuter Day Pack!
description: It's going for much less than usual. The post Save up to 20% on the Incase ARC Commuter Day Pack! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: It's going for much less than usual.
text: If you’re looking for a terrific backpack that can carry your laptop, tablet, accessories (and even a bit of clothing), then you might want to check out the Incase A.R.C. Commuter Pack. A 26L backpack, the A.R.C. Commuter Pack is available in a handful of different colours, and it’s also very spacious, with more than enough room to fit most laptops up to 16 inches in size. Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review (SAVE $400!) The exterior is constructed from recycled polyester, with a rubberized material at the top for added water resistance. On the sides you’ll find water bottle pockets which can also double as convenient storage for items like phones or wallets, offering quick access. There’s a zippered compartment behind the main body that provides space for other devices as well, in case you want to bring a tablet in addition to your laptop. In addition to the main storage space, you’ll find additional compartments on the top and bottom for items like chargers, cables, and other tech accessories. There’s also a cleverly-hidden magnetic pouch behind the top handle that offers quick access to essentials like wallets, phones, or passports, which is useful when traveling. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
If you’re looking for a terrific backpack that can carry your laptop, tablet, accessories (and even a bit of clothing), then you might want to check out the Incase A.R.C. Commuter Pack. A 26L backpack, the A.R.C. Commuter Pack is available in a handful of different colours, and it’s also very spacious, with more than enough room to fit most laptops up to 16 inches in size.

Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Review (SAVE $400!)

The exterior is constructed from recycled polyester, with a rubberized material at the top for added water resistance. On the sides you’ll find water bottle pockets which can also double as convenient storage for items like phones or wallets, offering quick access. There’s a zippered compartment behind the main body that provides space for other devices as well, in case you want to bring a tablet in addition to your laptop.

In addition to the main storage space, you’ll find additional compartments on the top and bottom for items like chargers, cables, and other tech accessories. There’s also a cleverly-hidden magnetic pouch behind the top handle that offers quick access to essentials like wallets, phones, or passports, which is useful when traveling.
